column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to [[Cor Blok]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}

column1: *'''Contents:''' The letter is a reply from Tolkien
column2: concerning an exhibition. Tolkien also asks if he may buy two pieces of artwork from Blok.
a facsimile of the letter appeared in ''[[A Tolkien Tapestry]]'' (page [6]).
